metadata.name: Potential LethalHTA Technique Execution
metadata.comment: Detects potential LethalHTA technique where the "mshta.exe" is spawned by an "svchost.exe" process

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\svchost.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mshta.exe')))

output.summary: Detects potential LethalHTA technique where the "mshta.exe" is spawned by an "svchost.exe" process
